dt-example.title: Inline editing
dt-example.info:
This example is basically the same as the [simple standalone editing example](simple.html) but in this case the `e-api inline()` method is used for editing the fields, rather than the `e-api edit()` primary method for editing the whole form.
Standalone forms can befit from [inline editing](../inline-editing) in exactly the same way as DataTables based editing forms and with all of the same features. As with DataTables, this can be very beneficial for speed of editing.
Please note that this example doesn't actually save to a database at the server. A refresh will result in the original values being restored.
